alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Powell, Estill and northwestern Jackson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Locust Branch, or 10 miles southwest of Irvine, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Station Camp, Wagersville, Drip Rock, Wisemantown, Alumbaugh, Witt, Kings Station and Rice Station around 440 PM EDT. South Irvine, West Irvine, Leighton, Weedon, Calloway Crossing and Sandhill around 445 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Irvine, Ravenna, Doe Creek, Cow Creek, Willow Tree, Pryse, Texola, Shade, North Irvine, Wiseman Crossing Station, Pitts, Cottage Furnace, Hardwick, Fitchburg, Cobhill, Patsey, Vaughns Mill, Furnace, Pilot, Knowlton, See, Stanton and Rogers Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
